biography.bio: Amparo Muñoz was born on June 22, 1954 in Vélez-Málaga, Málaga, Andalucía, Spain as Amparo Muñoz Quesada. She was an actress, known for Familia (1996), Mama Turns 100 (1979) and Delirios de amor (1986). She was married to Víctor Rubio and Patxi Andión. She died on February 27, 2011 in Málaga, Málaga.
biography.name: Amparo Muñoz

biography.bio: Simón Andreu was born on January 1, 1941 in Sa Pobla, Balearic Islands, Spain as Simón Andreu Trobat. He is an actor, known for Love in Difficult Times (2005), The Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian (2008) and Die Another Day (2002). He has been married to Maria Nieves Salgado since 1971.
biography.name: Simón Andreu

biography.bio: María Martín was born on July 14, 1923 in Marbella, Spain as María Martín Vargas. She is an actress, known for Golden Balls (1993), Bilbao (1978) and Dawn of America (1951).
biography.name: María Martín

biography.bio: Irina Kuberskaya was born on March 22, 1946 in Leningrad, RSFSR, USSR. She is an actress and director, known for Diary for My Lovers (1987), Napló apámnak, anyámnak (1990) and La mujer del ministro (1981).
biography.name: Irina Kuberskaya

biography.bio: Manuel Torres is an actor, known for La mujer del ministro (1981), Vivir mañana (1983) and Redacció (1988).
biography.name: Manuel Torres

biography.bio: José Luis Fernández 'Pirri' was born in 1965 in Madrid, Spain as José Luis Fernández Eguia. He was an actor, known for The Hit (1984), Sé infiel y no mires con quién (1985) and El pico 2 (1984). He died on May 9, 1988 in Madrid.
biography.name: José Luis Fernández 'Pirri'

biography.bio: Julieta Serrano was born on January 2, 1933 in Barcelona, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain as Julieta Serrano Romero. She is an actress, known for Women on the Verge of a Nervous Breakdown (1988), Tie Me Up! Tie Me Down! (1989) and Matador (1986).
biography.name: Julieta Serrano

biography.bio: Pastor Serrador was born on July 27, 1919 in Camagüey, Cuba as Heriberto Pastor Serrador. He was an actor, known for La violetera (1958), Asignatura aprobada (1987) and Al fin solos (1955). He was married to Luisa Sala. He died on December 16, 2006 in Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: Pastor Serrador

biography.bio: Enrique San Francisco was born on March 10, 1955 in Madrid, Spain as Enrique San Francisco Cobo. He is an actor, known for Cuéntame (2001), The Hit (1984) and La crisis carnívora (2007).
biography.name: Enrique San Francisco

biography.placeOfBirth: Arona, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Canary Islands, Spain
biography.bio: José Manuel Cervino was born on October 29, 1940 in Arona, Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Canary Islands, Spain as José Manuel Cervino Almeida. He is an actor, known for La guerra de los locos (1987), The Last Circus (2010) and Mararía (1998). He has been married to Maite Blasco since 1977.
biography.name: José Manuel Cervino

biography.bio: Antonio Betancourt is an actor, known for Sexperiencias (1968), Colegas (1982) and El pico 2 (1984).
biography.name: Antonio Betancourt

biography.bio: Ángel García is known for his work on Ballroom Dancing (1992), Floundering (1994) and Guantanamera (1995).
biography.name: Ángel García

biography.bio: José Luis Alexandre is known for his work on Atrapados en el miedo (1985), Family Portrait (1976) and The Most Natural Thing (1991).
biography.name: José Luis Alexandre

biography.bio: Manuel Calvo was born in 1927 in Arenys de Mar, Barcelona, Spain. He was an actor and director, known for Santa Claus (1959), Epílogo (1984) and El dolor de los hijos (1949). He was married to Madaleine Vivo. He died on April 18, 1987 in Mexico City, Mexico.
biography.name: Manuel Calvo

biography.bio: Marcial Zambrana is an actor, known for La mujer del ministro (1981), Impossible Love (1977) and Estudio 1 (1965).
biography.name: Marcial Zambrana
